definition[0]: the sound that you make by touching the top of your mouth with your tongue in order to show disapproval
definition[1]: to express disapproval by making a tut sound
example[0]: The nurse rushed in, tutting with irritation.
definition[2]: unwanted things, things of poor quality, or things that are making a place untidy
example[1]: My phone is somewhere underneath all this tut on my desk.
example[2]: He was talking a load of old tut about the house being haunted.
